attributes.action: The culling of badgers should not be allowed in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The vaccinations would also be cheaper due to the parents passing it on to their young so they would be covered and wouldn’t get TB.
attributes.background: Since 2013, thousands of badgers have been killed in a Government cull attempting to control bovine TB. Against scientific advice & before a 4 year trial has completed, the government is now going to cull 40% of the Uks badgers. The animals could just as easily be vaccinated rather than culled.
